(Honours) in Applied Sciences (Applied Mathematics) ---- ## Visiting Lecturer (November 2024 - Present) **Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka (IASSL)** #### Certificate in Applied Statistics * **CAS 105 1.0 Introduction to Statistical Modeling** ---- ## Teaching Assistant (July 2023 - April 2024) **Department of Statistics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura** #### Academic Year 2023/24 | Semester I and II ![](image_teaching_assistant.jpg) Conducted **tutorial classes and computer practical sessions** for the following course units: * STA 113 2.0 Descriptive Statistics * STA 114 2.0 Probability and Distribution Theory I * STA 124 2.0 Data Analysis I * STA 215 2.0 Sampling Techniques * STA 226 1.0 Data Analysis II * STA 326 2.0 Programming and Data Analysis with R * STA 330 2.0 Data Analysis and Preparation of Reports * STA 499 2.0 Statistical Methods
